Class TextLineWidget<TLW extends TextLineWidget<TLW>>

  • java.lang.Object

      • ch.nolix.element.core.Element
        • ch.nolix.element.core.MutableElement<ONE>
          • ch.nolix.element.bases.OptionalNamableElement<CE>
            • ch.nolix.element.bases.ConfigurableElement<W>
              • ch.nolix.element.GUI.Widget<BW,BWS>
                • ch.nolix.element.GUI.BackgroundWidget<BW,BWS>
                  • ch.nolix.element.GUI.BorderWidget<TLW,TextLineWidgetLook>
                    • ch.nolix.element.GUI.TextLineWidget<TLW>
  • Type Parameters:
    TLW - The type of a text line widget.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IFluentObject<TLW>, Namable<TLW>, Named, OptionalNamable<TLW>, OptionalTokenable<TLW>, Resettable<TLW>, Tokenable<TLW>, Tokened, Typed, TypeRequestable, Configurable<TLW>, Specifiable<TLW>, Specified
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Label, TextBox

    public abstract class TextLineWidget<TLW extends TextLineWidget<TLW>>
extends BorderWidget<TLW,TextLineWidgetLook>
    A text line rectangle is a rectangle that has a text in 1 line.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
